full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PHYAG RDOR GOS SNGON CAN GYI SGRUB THABS, RNAM SRAS BYIN 'BEBS DAG GA-YANG 'GUG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,*, ,NOR BDAG RGYAL CHEN RNAM THOS SRAS KYI SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR GA-YANG NYAMS GSO BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,CES PA DE NAS SNYIGS MA'I DUS 'DIR MI RNAMS LA NOR PHYUGS RNAMS KYI GA-YANG NYAMS NAS GOD KHA DANG DBUL 'PHONGS RNAMS SHING TU BRGYA ZHING, DE NYID ZHI'I PHYIR DU SE'I RAB 'BYAMS PA BSHAD SGRUB NYI MA'I NAN TEN CHEN PO BSKUL BA'I NGOR, GRUB CHEN DHAMA BADZRA DZA'I BSHAD PA'I RGYAL CHEN RNAM THOS SRAS KYI BZLOG BSGYUR MDOR BSDUS BRIS PA DGE BA PHAN YON JI LTAR NI, PHYI NANG NAD GDON THAMS CAD ZHI BA DANG GA-YANG NYAMS GSO BA DANG GOD KHA PHUR KHA'I 'KHOR LO BZLOG PAR BYED PA LA SOGS PA GNOD SBYIN GYI BE'U BUM NAS GSUNGS LTAR PHAN YON CHEN PO'I DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
